context: Global retail company, 15000 employees, implementing major organizational change following merger

request.purpose: Comprehensive employee engagement and change management program for post-merger integration
request.justification: Ensure smooth transition and maintain employee morale during organizational restructuring

decision_process.outcome: High change fatigue identified with significant engagement concerns
Multi-faceted engagement program designed addressing key concerns
Strong stakeholder support secured for program implementation
Program approved with $4M budget and 12-month implementation timeline

business_impact.cultural_integration: Successful merger integration with unified company culture
